Hi Sophie, 

There were some recent updates with the website and Stripe. As we are not immediately capturing payment (upon quote acceptance), it's represented as a discount to bring the transaction value down to $0. This is only seen by internal team members. Customers will still have the same experience.

If the full amount is pushed through, Stripe would capture funds then and there. 

I hope that clears it up?

Hi Guys,



This is still happening





Sophie BekkeliASSISTANT TO SENIOR STYLIST

sbekkeli@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au
